channel.title: CVE Feed for Adobe Systems Incorporated -- Flash Player
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Adobe Systems Incorporated -- Flash Player

item.title: CVE-2017-3106|2024-08-05T14:16:27.873Z -- adobe%20systems%20incorporated -- flash%20player
item.description: Adobe Flash Player versions 26.0.0.137 and earlier have an exploitable type confusion vulnerability when parsing SWF files. Successful exploitation could lead to arbitrary code execution.

item.title: CVE-2017-3085|2024-08-05T14:16:27.863Z -- adobe%20systems%20incorporated -- flash%20player
item.description: Adobe Flash Player versions 26.0.0.137 and earlier have a security bypass vulnerability that leads to information disclosure when performing URL redirect.
